mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(userId, title, author, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{author}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.userId, r.title, r.author, DATE_FORMAT(r.date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "date", r.content, r.likes, u.PROFILEIMGPATH, CASE WHEN l.userid IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS liked FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN likes l ON r.id = l.reviewId AND l.userid = #{userId} ORDER BY r.id DESC LIMIT #{pageable.pageSize} OFFSET #{pageable.offset};
